meanings.definition: The state or quality of being ripe.
meanings.sent1: The ripeness of the fruit made it sweet and juicy.
meanings.sent2: The ripeness of the banana indicated it was ready to eat.
meanings.sent3: The ripeness of the avocado was so perfect that it made the guacamole delicious.
meanings.sent4: The ripeness of the tomatoes in the garden was a sign of a successful harvest.
meanings.sent5: The ripeness of the peach was evident from its fragrant aroma.

meanings.sent1: The ripeness of the fruit was a result of the gradual ripening process.
meanings.sent2: The ripeness of the apple showed that it had completed its ripening.
meanings.sent3: The ripeness of the mango was like a slow dance towards sweetness.
meanings.sent4: The ripeness of the grapes was a journey from green to purple.
meanings.sent5: The ripeness of the pear was a transformation from firm to soft.

meanings.definition: The condition of being fully developed or mature.
meanings.sent1: The ripeness of the cheese was a sign of its quality.
meanings.sent2: The ripeness of the wine indicated it was ready to be enjoyed.
meanings.sent3: The ripeness of the wisdom in his words was beyond his years.
meanings.sent4: The ripeness of the relationship was evident in their deep understanding.
meanings.sent5: The ripeness of the idea was ready to be shared with the world.
